title: Discogs does not guarantee that it or the products obtained through it meet the users' expectations or requirements

tosdr.case: This service does not guarantee that it or the products obtained through it meet the users' expectations or requirements
tosdr.tldr: Discogs' ToS state that "(b) DISCOGS MAKES NO WARRANTY THAT (i) THE SERVICE WILL MEET YOUR REQUIREMENTS, [...] (iv) THE QUALITY OF ANY PRODUCTS, SERVICES, INFORMATION, OR OTHER MATERIAL PURCHASED OR OBTAINED BY YOU THROUGH THE SERVICE WILL MEET YOUR EXPECTATIONS"
